metadata.name: D4 Rerolls Item Wisps (+Tainted Eden)
metadata.description:
By default, the D4 doesn't re-roll item wisps. This mod corrects that. Be warned that there seems to be a hard limit of 64 total familiars (including wisps). If you're close to the limit then you may end up with less item wisps after they've been re-rolled due to other familiars spawning. Other items that call the D4 (d100, d infinity, missing no, dice room, reverse wheel of fortune, etc) are also supported.
Item wisps will also be re-rolled when Tainted Eden takes damage.
Re-rolled item wisps will reset their hp.
This was split off from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2966818059]Item Wisp Challenge[/url] as a standalone mod.
